name: Ice Mephit
description: An Ice Mephit is a small creature made of ice and frost with jagged wings and sharp claws.
memorable: Can explode in a burst of ice upon death, causing area damage.
goals: To create chaos in cold environments and ambush unwary adventurers.
relations: Often found among other mephits or in the company of ice-themed creatures.
environment: Cold environments such as glaciers, snow-covered mountains, or icy caves.
strengths: Immunity to cold and poison damage; can summon other mephits.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning and fire damage, limiting its combat options.
attacks: Claws attack inflicts slashing and cold damage; can use freezing breath for area control.
most_powerful_ability: Frost Breath, causing cold damage and potential restraining of enemies.
senses: Can see in darkness with darkvision and has average perception.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing it to remain unnoticed.
additional_information: Can camouflage as an ordinary shard of ice.
Does not require air, sustenance, or sleep.
Can create areas of obscured visibility with fog.
spellcasting: Can cast fog cloud once per day without material components.
test_queries: small icy creature with explosive death
elemental that can summon other mephits
mephit that uses cold for attacks and ambush
frosty demon that hides as ice shard
creature from icy caves capable of obscuring fog
